Instruction: Cookgether the cooked brown rice, milk, blueberries, cinnamon, and honey in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil, then simmer over low heat for 20 minutes.

Whisk the egg in a small bowl. Gradually combine the hot rice into the egg mixture, about a tablespoon at a time, incorporating approximately 6 tablespoons. Add the egg mixture to the rice along with the vanilla and butter. Cook over low heat for 1 to 2 minutes to thicken.
